column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I love the corkage fee  "share a glass with another patron
column2: at another table". how fun and creative is that.  brought two bottles to have with our dinner and was happy to share.  started with marrow
column3: its probalby the best marrow I have had.  then we split a crab avocado sald
column4: equally yummy but filling.... uh oh. split a steak but I couldnt even finish the  half a steak.  seasoned just rigth too.  loved it all.  and of course YOU  MUST DO THE WHISKEY ICE CREAM. that was over the top!  service was spot on
column5: the whole experiences was top notch and I would def go again.
